title: Would you consider a colored lip balm as a makeup product?

og.title: Would you consider a colored lip balm as a makeup product?
og.description: Answer (1 of 8): Yes, a colored lip balm can be considered as a makeup product. While traditional lip balms are primarily used for moisturizing and protecting the lips, colored lip balms contain pigments or dyes that provide a tint or hue to the lips. This can help enhance the natural color of th...
